page.title: 18Four Oaks - Recreation
page.content: The main centre of recreation used by the people of our area is Wyndley Leisure Centre.Its superb facilities include squash and badminton courts while football and tennis is played on outdoor astro turf.Other recreational sources are the various tennis clubs and highly recommended golf courses where many top class tournaments are held.Gardening is popular in this part of the West Midlands.In Sutton Park joggers rub shoulders with dog lovers while fishermen vie for water with boaters.Streetly Community Centre serves the west of this area with its football pitches,basketball and sqaush courts.Also available for the older generation is accommodation for'old time dancing',whist clubs,flower arranging and other events.Recreation plays a major role in the lives if the people of Four Oaks.
